name: servicenow
title: ServiceNow
description: Search and explore content across your ServiceNow instances
author: ralvarezalonso

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search
commands.description: View past searches, perform new queries, and switch between ServiceNow instances

commands.name: manage-instance-profiles
commands.title: Manage Instance Profiles
commands.description: Configure and manage your ServiceNow instance profiles for use in search queries

commands.name: quickly-search
commands.title: Quickly Search
commands.description: Search your ServiceNow instance instantly from the command window by entering a query, without extra steps

commands.name: quickly-search-selected-instance
commands.title: Quickly Search in Selected Instance
commands.description: Search your selected ServiceNow instance instantly from the command window by entering a query, without extra steps

commands.name: open-all-instances
commands.title: Open All Instances
commands.description: Open all configured ServiceNow instances in the browser

commands.name: open-selected-instance
commands.title: Open Selected Instance
commands.description: Open the currently selected ServiceNow instance in the browser

commands.name: open-current-url
commands.title: Open Current URL
commands.description: Open the current ServiceNow URL in the specified instance

commands.name: open-current-url-in-selected-instance
commands.title: Open Current URL in Selected Instance
commands.description: Open the current ServiceNow URL in the selected instance

commands.name: add-instance-profile
commands.title: Add Instance Profile
commands.description: Add a new instance profile for your searches

commands.name: explore-tables
commands.title: Explore Tables
commands.description: Browse and explore the tables within an instance

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
